department.ch: 學習與教學研究所碩士班

goal.en: Be able to understand the functions and relations among each chapter of a research paper. Be able to search for appropriate amount of related literature. Be able to develop skills for literature review. Be able to find a literature gap. Be able to categorize ideas from literature and develop an argument. Be able to write one section of literature review chapter.
goal.ch: 1. 理解第二章與學術論文各章之間的關係與功能 2. 應用學術文獻資訊檢索能力取得與過濾合宜之相關文獻 3. 發展為分析與使用而閱讀學術文獻之概念技法 4. 評析與提拔文獻以培養明確指認自己可進行的文獻缺口 5. 分類與組織思路使文獻探討能呈現自己清晰的立場與論述 6. 彙整上述能力試寫出一節文獻探討

content.en:
overview
learners‘ preparation
the importance of literature review
advanced literature search skills
articles selection
critically reading skills
developing ideas via sticky notes
sorting ideas
practice and discussions
identifying a literature gap
supporting evidence for the gap
writing skills
discussions on written examples
oral report on written sections
peer review
content.ch:
課程介紹
各言爾志
LR有什麼重要？
進階文獻檢索能力
從眾多文獻中過濾這學期能處理的練習份量
閱讀一篇英文文獻之技法示範
如何針對自己的提問來閱讀文獻，以發展單篇評述能力
以小貼紙建立自己與每篇文章的對話
從多篇彙整與分類想法
指認文獻缺口
個別諮詢
確立指認缺口的證據與論述
書寫文獻評述之技法示範
個別諮詢
期末寫作成果分享與互評
期末週/期末作品老師回饋

textbook.en: Hart, C. (2018). Doing a literature review: Releasing the research imagination. Sage Publications.
